field.label: Customer Alias Management
field.comment: You can allow the customers to manage/delete their aliases in the their account.

field.label: Await Notification
field.comment: In some cases it may take a few seconds until the transaction is successfully authorized. When this option is enabled, the notification is awaited.

field.label: Sage Pay Vender Name
field.comment: Used to authenticate your site. This should contain the Sage Pay Vendor Name supplied by Sage Pay when your account was created.

field.label: Operation Mode
field.comment: You can switch between the different environments, by selecting the corresponding operation mode.

field.label: Deferred Authorization Type
field.comment: Sage Pay supports two types of deferred authorization. The deferred authorization allows only one capture per transaction, but it guarantees the payment, because a reservation is added on the customer's card. In case of authenticate you can do multiple captures per transaction, but there is no reservation of the amount on the card.

field.label: Description of the order
field.comment: The description of goods purchased is displayed on the Sage Pay Server payment page as the customer enters their card details.

field.label: Transaction ID Prefix
field.comment: Here you can insert a transaction prefix. The prefix allows you to change the transaction number that is transmitted to Sage Pay. The prefix must contain the tag {id}. It will then be replaced by the order number (e.g. name_{id}).

field.label: Basket
field.comment: During the checkout the basket can be sent to Sage Pay. It can be sent as XML, Basic.

field.label: Gift Aid
field.comment: By enabling the gife aid option the customer can ticke a box during the checkout process to indicate she or he wish to donate the tax.This option requires that the your Sage Pay account has enabled the gift aid option.

field.label: MoTo CVC Check
field.comment: When a mail / telephone order (MoTo) is made, should the authorization process check the CVC?

field.label: The 3rd Man
field.comment: Should results from The 3rd Man fraud screening be polled and saved on the transaction?

field.label: Username
field.comment: The username used for administrative requests.

field.label: Password
field.comment: The password used for administrative requests.

field.label: Show Payment Id
field.comment: Show the payment id in the order information

field.label: Use Base Currency
field.comment: Send amounts to Sage Pay in store's base currency.

field.label: Invoice Settlement
field.comment: Choose settlement after order in case you want an invoice to be created with your oder. The state of the invoice will set according to your capture status.

field.label: Send Invoice Email
field.comment: Send the invoice email automatically after invoice creation.

field.label: Address Check Result
field.comment: During the checkout the address and post code are checked against the linked data with the credit card. The selected outcomes are threaded as uncertain transactions.

field.label: CV2 Check Result
field.comment: During the checkout the CV2 code is checked. The selected outcomes are treated as uncertain transactions.

field.label: 3D Secure Check
field.comment: During the authorization of the payment a 3D secure check may be done. The selected outcomes are treated as uncertain transactions.

field.label: Fraud Check Result
field.comment: During the authorization of the payment a fraud check may be done by ReD. The selected outcomes are treated as uncertain transactions.

field.label: Capturing
field.comment: Should the amount be captured automatically after the order (direct) or should the amount only be reserved (deferred)?
